references.paper_title: A baseline for detecting misclassified and out-of-distribution examples in neural networks
references.reason: This paper establishes a fundamental baseline for OOD detection, forming a foundational work for many subsequent studies in the field.

references.paper_title: Enhancing the reliability of out-of-distribution image detection in neural networks
references.reason: This paper makes significant advancements in OOD detection by proposing a method to enhance the reliability of detection, thereby pushing the state-of-the-art.

references.paper_title: Delving into out-of-distribution detection with vision-language representations
references.reason: This paper leverages vision-language models, showcasing a significant improvement and shift in approaches compared to traditional vision-only methods.

references.paper_title: Negative label guided OOD detection with pretrained vision-language models
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the issue of semantic misalignment in OOD detection, a problem that many other previous approaches struggle with.
This paper introduces a widely used benchmark for OOD detection, providing a standardized evaluation platform and facilitating fair comparisons among different methods.
